events.name: Tuesday 10th March
events.description: Welcome back! Last time was so much fun we thought we would try make it weekly. Our goal is to increase the diversity of the Ruby on Rails community in Singapore - so if you know anyone that you think would enjoy learning to code, invite them along!

events.name: 'No boilerplate code' night
events.description: This month we have 2 senior speakers from Palo-IT . They will show some great ways to reduce your boilerplate code. 6:45 - 7:15 :: Food and networking 7:15 - 8:45 :: Talks and Q&A 8:45 - 9:00 :: Mingling -------------- First Talk: Removing boilerplate code with Lombok Speaker: Eric Lefevre . Senior Software Developer, Palo-IT. 15 years of experience Java programmer. His interview is available here . Abstract: Sick of writing setters and getters? toString()/equals()/hashCode() methods? Jealous of those new, less-verbose programming languages? Discover Lombok, a tool that will make your Java code easier, lighter and better looking! Second talk - Spring Data JPA Speaker: Cédric Arnoult . technical leader, Palo-IT. 15 years of experience Java programmer. Also used to be a Java instructor, loves to teach and share knowledge. His interview is available here . Abstract: Spring Data JPA, the best way to get "wowwwwww" again when doing database access. Easy, reliable and efficient, you'll love it. I'll talk about our experience with using it in our customer's project. =====================
events.location: PayPal office in Millenia Tower, 1 Temasek Avenue Millenia Tower #14-01, Singapore

events.name: Azure Community March Meetup
events.description: Hi All, We would like to invite you to Azure Community Singapore March Meetup. Please join this exciting community and learn more on Azure for your cloud development as well as you web/network infrastructure. There will be several topics to be shared but if you want to contribute as well, please do let me know are just come forward on the event day. Please bring your IT Pro or developers friends to join. See you all and let's have fun in the cloud. Topics Agenda: • Its' all about Virtual Network in Azure for beginner. - Riza • Create Proxy or VPN in Azure and maybe you can watch Netflix at the same time. - Terence Lim • Reality of the Clouds . Good or bad times. Prepare an umbrella before raining and always have backup clothing to deal with rain, sort of. - Goh Chun Lin • Etc. ( anyone care to contribute, please let me know ) Notes : I'm also looking for Ruby , Joyent Node.js , io.js , Python , Java and PHP expert who uses Azure PaaS or IaaS. Please help to contribute for this community. Many thanks and we appreciate it. Wi-Fi : Available (Free) Food : Available (Thanks to Microsoft Singapore) Door Prize : We need sponsors for this :) but, there will be a surprise.
events.location: 22CF12, Level 22, Microsoft Singapore, Singapore 018989, One Marina Boulevard

events.name: Creative Crew Talks - March Meeting 2015
events.description:
An Event for People Who Love to be Inspired 
Creative Crew Singapore is a non-profit organisation devoted to spear the development of the local community for greater learning.  We explore the learning evolution - learn unique experiences with tools or stories to give shape to ideas, and what are the trends that will shape how you'll work and think.  
We hold a series of talks and workshops by some of the brightest minds from design, development, experience and technology. 
  
 Photos credit to Peter Lim   

An evening on Pre and Post Video Productions 
  
Programme Details 
  
Why is pre-production the most important stage of any video project?
by Robert Cristobal
 
Find out why not spending time to hone ideas before filming can be counter productive.
  
Color Video Grading
 by Lynus Hee
 
Movies often use colours to emote a story. To give your videos the cinematic look you don't need fancy machines or softwares to do it. Adobe Certified Instructor Lynus Hee will explain the theory behind colour grading and demonstrate a method that can be used in Adobe Photoshop, Premiere Pro and After Effects.
  

  
Meet Our Speakers 
  
  
  
Robert Cristobal 
 
Robert Cristobal, Creative Storyteller from Frame 316 will share how you can maximize your production from the preparation steps and get practical techniques to make the life of the people in your production team easier. 
  
  
Lynus Hee 
 
Apart from a great sense of humour, I have 18 years of experience as a motion graphics designer and photographer. I am also an Adobe Certified Instructor (Video Specialist) and provide training for Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere Pro and Adobe After Effects.  
  

  

 

Who should attend? This talk is suitable for anyone who want to learn and meet awesome people. 
  
Where is the talks held in the Toa Payoh Public Library? We are located at Level 1, Programme Zone 
 
 
  

 
 

Admission Rules 
It's a Free Seating Event. 
Networking with speakers will commence after the event. 
  
Duration: 
Approx 2 hrs  
  
Venue: 
6 Toa Payoh Central Singapore 319191 
  
How to get there: Nearest MRT Station : Toa Payoh Nearest Bus Interchange : Toa Payoh Central Buses : SBS Transit 56, 105, 153, 232 via Toa Payoh Central SBS Transit 8, 26, 28, 31, 73, 88, 90, 139, 142, 143, 145, 155, 157, 159,  163, 231, 235, 238 via Toa Payoh Interchange 
  
Like us on Facebook 
  
  
Meet the Sponsor
events.location: Toa Payoh Public Library, Programme Zone, , 6 Toa Payoh Central, Singapore 319191
